"Cinema on Canvas": A film festival that showcases short films created entirely by artists using unconventional mediums such as paint, sculpture, or even food.
"Green Screen": A film festival that focuses on environmentally themed films, including documentaries, shorts, and features.
"Science Fiction Shorts": A film festival that exclusively screens short films set in the future or featuring advanced technology.
"Women in Film": A film festival that highlights the work of female filmmakers from around the world.
"Audio-Visual Art": A film festival that focuses on experimental and avant-garde films that use sound and visuals to create a unique sensory experience.
